thread.title: Gujarat HC to hear Modi selfie case on October 23
thread.title_full: Gujarat HC to hear Modi selfie case on October 23 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Gujarat HC to hear Modi selfie case on October 23
text:
AHMEDABAD: Gujarat high court has fixed October 23 for further hearing on admitting a petition related to the alleged poll code breach by Prime Minister Narendra Modi by taking a selfie with party symbol and addressing a press conference on the day of general elections on April 30, 2014.
After Justice G R Udhwani recused himself from the case, the matter was placed on Thursday before Justice J B Pardiwala who said, "Matter to appear at serial number one on October 23 with an understanding that it will be heard peremptorily."
The court adjourned hearing after public prosecutor Mitesh Amin and petitioner Nishant Varma's counsel K R Koshti apprised the court of the case history. Justice Udhwani admitted the case and later deferred the order of admission till October 6 in order to give one more chance to the state government to defend lower court's decision of rejecting Varma's application to add more charges against Modi besides the sections invoked by the Election Commission of India. The city crime branch had later given a clean chit to Modi in this case.
